body:
Hi, i did all the instruction mentioned in [here](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/build-windows.md) but when i hit `CONFIG_SITE=$PWD/depends/x86_64-w64-mingw32/share/config.site ./configure --prefix=/` command i get this:
`qwin10helpers.cpp:60:37: fatal error: uiviewsettingsinterop.h: No such file or directory
compilation terminated.
Makefile.Release:6922: recipe for target '.obj/release/qwin10helpers.o' failed
make[5]: *** [.obj/release/qwin10helpers.o] Error 1
make[5]: Leaving directory '/home/fivil/bitcoin/depends/work/build/x86_64-w64-mingw32/qt/5.9.6-dafa751a5be/qtbase/src/plugins/platforms/windows'
Makefile:36: recipe for target 'release' failed
make[4]: *** [release] Error 2
make[4]: Leaving directory '/home/fivil/bitcoin/depends/work/build/x86_64-w64-mingw32/qt/5.9.6-dafa751a5be/qtbase/src/plugins/platforms/windows'
Makefile:66: recipe for target 'sub-windows-make_first' failed
make[3]: *** [sub-windows-make_first] Error 2
make[3]: Leaving directory '/home/fivil/bitcoin/depends/work/build/x86_64-w64-mingw32/qt/5.9.6-dafa751a5be/qtbase/src/plugins/platforms'
Makefile:96: recipe for target 'sub-platforms-make_first' failed
make[2]: *** [sub-platforms-make_first] Error 2
make[2]: Leaving directory '/home/fivil/bitcoin/depends/work/build/x86_64-w64-mingw32/qt/5.9.6-dafa751a5be/qtbase/src/plugins'
Makefile:687: recipe for target 'sub-plugins' failed
make[1]: *** [sub-plugins] Error 2
make[1]: Leaving directory '/home/fivil/bitcoin/depends/work/build/x86_64-w64-mingw32/qt/5.9.6-dafa751a5be/qtbase/src'
funcs.mk:242: recipe for target '/home/fivil/bitcoin/depends/work/build/x86_64-w64-mingw32/qt/5.9.6-dafa751a5be/qtbase/.stamp_built' failed
make: *** [/home/fivil/bitcoin/depends/work/build/x86_64-w64-mingw32/qt/5.9.6-dafa751a5be/qtbase/.stamp_built] Error 2`
well first time it took very long amount of time till showing this error but after that it just keep appearing in no time
Oh and i think it worth to mention that i did try to manually download and attach missed header file but no luck :(
title: unable to build in windows 10 x64 using Windows Subsystem for Linux (WSL)
